bow: mother in law thinks that montessori is cult my son just started montessori and my crazy mother in law is convinced that it cult tried looking for it on the internet to try and see what crazy bullshit rabbit hole she might have fallen down but could even find anything slightly convincing long story short think it just her way of putting negative spin on something wonderful just had to rant and get it off my chest kind of lame post yep it because it not her idea my mil plays devils advocate for everything she even tried telling me shouldn put baby changing table in the master bathroom and only keep it in the baby room for when we first bring our baby home even though the baby will be sleeping in our room it like how does that even make sense my mil legitimately believed that me reaching above my head at any point during pregnancy would strangle my child with his cord and kill him but would light cigarettes in front of me and let the smoke blow into my face without even trying to move or ya know just not smoke in front of me in an enclosed space sometimes mil need to be kept at arms length ll never understand why they think they have any say or sway in how we raise our children 17 weeks pregnant ftm and always thought montessori was super hoity toity and silly ve been looking into minimalist nurseries and now all can think when read about montessori at home is that is so damn developmetally appropriate think we re going to skip the crib say your can suck it do bother showing her research or explaining the philosophy unless she asks and sounds genuine about it people who have their minds made up are rarely interested in another way of seeing things maybe polite but firm unless you have some questions for me about this developmental approach rather talk about something else it sucks when you ve worked hard to make good decision for your kid and you get upturned noses from the folks who are supposed to support you my children have all been brought up with the montessori principles implemented at home perhaps your mil should be informed that prince william children also went to montessori nurseries as concept it makes great deal of sense and can vouch for the fact that it brings about responsible youngsters and allows their creativity and curiosity to flourish within appropriate boundaries forward this https en wikipedia org wiki montessori education how anyone can come to the conclusion that it cult is beyond me also who cares why would anyone care where you have changing table it doesn affect your mil in the least my mil is like this too so know the logic behind it all actually doesn matter just saying exactly my mom said that to me mom it not puppet string my mil believes that she also believes it bad luck to buy anything for the baby before it born she legit sent her husband out with list while she was still in the hospital after giving birth to my husband live on small island and our baby is due week before christmas there no way sending my husband out last minute shopping because of her crazy superstitions maybe she thinking of waldorf personally stay away from that yeah came here to say the same thing just googled that and ll bet you that what she stumbled upon maybe can change her mind wo hold my breath but it worth shot 33 and went to montessori elementary school can confirm it not cult it great environment for kids to learn not sure what your mil is thinking not interested in the rabbit hole so could you kindly give me rundown of what waldorf is and why it cult would you mind explaining why that is very curious since having my son have loved reading about the montessori concept and set ups but have never heard about waldorf thank you for any info waldorf is feel good child centered pre school philosophy that has ton of unfortunately mystical and racist roots you ll see many programs call themselves waldorf *style* rather than waldorf as result it not cult imo but it close enough that if you google is waldorf cult you ll get lot of results and at least one minute youtube video thank you you put the change table where you think it makes most sense ended up moving mine to my living room for while because it was more practical there since we lived mostly there baby napped in her play pen all day and could change her on my bed at night in the room where we both slept when she moved into her room and had less naps back in her room it went guests might have thought it looked funny in the living room but when she had blowout or spit up had some extra pj in the top drawer and all the wipes years ago attended seminar and wrote paper on the montessori method for use in dementia care ve summed it up nicely here without the dementia bits for you to share with her to show her that no it is not cult and if it is well it the most wholesome goddamn cult ve ever heard of cult of prepared environments and meaningful interactions of independence and reaching one full potential that pretty wild and makes me lol on mobile so forgive the format dr maria montessori was italy first ever female physician in the late 1800 she worked with underprivileged children thought by some to be insane or suffering from mental retardation she observed each child and created what she called prepared environment tailor made for each individual to learn in based on their needs interests skills and ability as result the children flourished and even excelled far surpassing the expectations placed on them her philosophy was to enable individuals to be as independent as possible to have meaningful place in their community to have high self esteem and to have the chance to make meaningful contributions to their community *behind the impairment there is person with past present and future* if we revisit maslow hierarchy of needs which are physiological food water warmth safety amp security shelter freedom of fear love amp belonging friends family self esteem confidence respect of self and from others amp self actualization to have purpose acceptance and to reach one full potential you can see that dr montessori approach closely followed this hierarchy that outlines our basic needs as human beings and that you can not really have one of those needs met without another **she really underscored the importance of having her students feel respected by her ** think your mil is mixing up montessori with waldorf if you google waldorf you find lot of ex parents and administrators claiming it is almost cult and religion of sorts they have all sorts of kooky beliefs like children not reading till six or seven and being blank page etc montessori always gets mixed up with waldorf unfortunately to the chagrin of montessori sure thing all of my children went through are going through the montessori method it incredibly beneficial waldorf is not really method it mindset my parents put me into private waldorf school from an early age so my opinion is based on what was exposed to combined with knowing people who work in those schools parents with kids currently in it or left positives would say are yes creativity is encouraged although only if said creativity fits in with their vision for example any child who enjoyed art could explore that as long as it was only using the typical waldorf watercolour method no other mediums allowed by the time you re 16 you may be able to try sculpting with recycled goods whatever you produce should be reflective of waldorf also no continuous examination negatives are longer list complete disregard for medical science or modern medicine when was just shy of six was involved in catastrophic car accident my mother skull was half shattered and her brain was visible was certain that she was dead she wasn but remained in coma for very long time before waking up as different person my grandmother was unconscious and my baby brother and were trapped inside the car upon returning to school the idea that should receive therapy was completely stomped down by the school their school boards flex their influence with reckless abandon and instead was made to do daily eurythmy which is sort of dance thing that is in every waldorf school barely spoke for year had trauma migraines and was prescribed energy healing and more eurythmy my bil also went to waldorf and is type one diabetic teacher there did not believe in diabetes and refused to allow him leave the classroom to get his insulin from his locker he passed out short while after and almost had to be rushed to hospital due to diabetic coma educational material is very airy fairy and the way in which you re taught is very difficult to translate over to normal study if you had television you would have constant letters or telephone calls urging it be got rid of pupils with television or any technology bar home telephone would be lectured any clothing from an identifiable company would be removed and not returned more lecturing of the child not the parent even though they re the ones paying thousands each year in school fees very lax security children can easily come and go even of kindergarten age great deal of exploitation of foreign employees who aren really employed at all and personally witnessed scheme that utilised local down syndrome and other similarly disabled youth for physical labour protection akin to the catholic church if you understand my meaning could go on but there probably lot online from other ex pupils and other sources would never recommend it the montessori method however is very practical very confidence building and highly recommend that removed my mil told us we were crazy for allowing our newborn to sleep in the same room because this bedroom was always theirs and the kids were not allowed ever had section and could barely get off the bed to get my kid out of the bassinet next to us am not running to another room to get him plus it lot safer for them to be in our room for the first little while as teacher just wanted to say that montessori is super awesome how exciting for your son mils can be the worst might just lean right into that and invite your mil to the initiation ceremony where they sacrifice chicken and use it blood to draw pentagrams on the children foreheads montessori is hugely popular in my area there over dozen montessori elementary schools in my county using montessori principles to teach my lo who is too young for preschool still thank you for sharing your story experience am so sorry for what you have been through what funny is that things had heard about montessori very hard stance against tv any character shirts children often wear is actually waldorf belief when researching more about montessori after having my son wondered why so many people have come across were somewhat against it and it very well could be for the same reasons as op mil they are confusing it with waldorf again thank you for sharing extremely interesting feel preschools today are starting to lean more towards montessori albeit slowly with much more child led learning hope your children are enjoying the beginnings of their educational journey in montessori schools skipped the crib and my god has it been amazing never regretted it so far but lo is 13 months just obvs make sure you baby proof the bejesus out of babys room and look at door lock for nursery door we eneded up putting baby gate in his doorway so we could be sure he wouldnt go for wander at night if he woke up lol same here montessori highly recommend it was at least grade levels ahead in english and writing when transferred into public school waldorf alumnus here sure they have their limitations the biggest problem is dogmatism and misapplication of said dogma and sometimes plain bad teaching hiding behind it it not cult the mystical elements are not to be taken literally the siege mentality only sets in when some celebrity or rationalist campaigner gets bee in their bonnet and sics the media on them for attention with minimal investigation send my child to waldorf school they are very strict about limiting or eliminating screen time hardly feel good and developing independence of thought and spirit things that are so rare that the peer group waldorf school could provide is worth the ideological baggage could you be more specific what precisely qualifies montessori as legitimate what are the theoretical considerations around when to start reading from scientific and waldorf perspectives surely you re not resorting to argumentum ad populum my mom has this same belief my son was month old when we did shower my mom was mad that had bought stuff my mom seen pregnant woman jogging and said that she should be doing that while pregnant cause she could have miscarriage when asked her to help me move couch she said you re pregnant not handicapped jesus cant even think of my first pregnancy and the first year after without my blood boiling cause of her love her and she is so much better now and we talk everyday and see eachother at least once week with no issue and have lots of fun together but swear me being pregnant with her first grandchild made her fucking insane for bit removed well texted her that think she confused with waldorf which is understandable because lot of people would make the same mistake also would be concerned about my grandkids going to waldorf school no reply which just tells me that she not interested in understanding but just finding the negative side of everything wish just left it alone oh well what kid of lock did you use ve seen the ones where it like case that goes over the doorknob something like that have round knobs and got some crochet covers on etsy they work great come in lots of colors and do feel like cheap plastic my own mother goes slack jawed every time tell her stuff that is literally just recommended by my pediatrician baby sleeping in crib in our room for the first several months no screen time rear facing carseat until at least two years old etc it not even extreme stuff just the basics our very conventional doctor says to do oooh that sounds so much nicer that such generational thing my grandmothers old boomers had that rule parents bedroom is strictly off limits to any and all children indefinitely my mother and mil were 90s parents who breastfed and bed shared not because they were crunchy earth mamas but because it was the 90s and the gen young boomers sort of started to stray away from the detachment parenting style of their parents have kids and have never owned crib or bassinet once my kids are around they sleep on twin on the floor in their room saves and makes way more sense oh can confirm that montessori schools do not like screen time and clothes with characters on them my mil believes everything can be healed with doterra essential oils mother in laws be crazy here are number of academic studies evaluating montessori education at the preschool level and higher vs more traditional methods https scholar google com scholar q=montessori+academic+outcomes+study amp hl=en amp as sdt=0 amp as vis=1 amp oi=scholart caveat that if you are looking at montessori education for your child it worth it to seek out an ami or ams licensed school because anyone can slap the name montessori on any school my friend is math teacher and when she heard we were putting our kids in montessori preschool she congratulated us and said that it lays life long basis for math learning after spending time in the classroom with the materials understand why is your mother in law jewish that actually belief of theirs to get around it my friend contacted shop that caters to jewish people and had the stuff ordered once the baby was born the stuff was immediately sent to the home because of this jewish people don have baby showers understand why someone can have that fear not saying it should be the norm but ve known people who have had to rush to return most of the baby shower gifts while new mother is still in the hospital grieving ca imagine losing baby amp then having to go into the perfectly set up nursery once you are discharged home totally respect your view amp they should too even if they do agree but can see why other people choose the other route similar to how some women do announce their pregnancy until the 2nd trimester personally shared the news very early to people who close too but can see why others would she not jewish she ukrainian believe she is orthodox christian she led with babushki say so guess it quite common belief among the older generation there for the first two years of his life my son wardrobe was almost entirely provided by several giant boxes of clothes in every size from newborn to 3t which was passed on to me by family who lost their pregnant daughter and several grandchildren when their car was struck on mountain road and went over the side and plummeted down the mountain did want to take them begged them to return it and use the money for the headstones anything but they insisted that those items had been bought with joy for growing child and that knowing that growing child was wearing them and feeling joy would be more healing to them than anything else they could do with them so took them but have these moments of extreme sadness sometimes thinking about where those clothes had come from and it made me determined to do something joyful instead so that the clothes would somehow be happy and the spirits of the family could somehow be happy too it did really make any sense and it was strange experience all around it did help in moments when my child was difficult though to be reminded that he was there when others were and just appreciate him more in spite of the tantrums and melt downs and sleepless nights these superstitions do come from nowhere they come from place of fear and grief and need to protect and defend against the cruel twists of fate that can snatch away our happiness without any warning we do whatever we can because otherwise we feel powerless they really are we just ordered several more as our son has gotten very inquisitive lately keeps him out of bathrooms and the garage ece here it really isn developmentally appropriate for children to read before or that not to say they can learn before then but we really are pushing it too early in public schools don push reading on my kids but my child is three and has loved books since two she sits on her bed and actively sleeps with her books and flips through them and asks me what the words mean and loves her stories sorry not being allowed books till six or seven is just ridiculous was reading twenty picture books day by the time was five by myself and it was my favorite activity it not keeping books away it not forcing them to read before they are developmentally ready there is nothing better for future reading skills than reading to you child every day early literacy skills like page flipping and following along with finger is what they should be doing removed we unfortunately have lever door handles in our house so used some extra panels from our refalo play yard gate we bought and made little entrance way in los room thought about changing out the knob but then realized he loves sitting behind the door effectively trapping me outside amp riskingnhis safety of door is opened quickly so decided on baby gate instead awkward room design forced us to use panels to fill the spot thank you this is all was asking for why people feel the need to downvote me for asking for evidence is beyond me same this is my first year teaching montessori and now know my kids will definitely do until at least pre in montessori my school is weeks to 6th grade
